newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Shun Shing in HK public housing contract.
newsitem.headline: Shun Shing in HK public housing contract.

text.p: Shung Shing Holdings Ltd said on Monday it had secured a public housing estate contract of HK$290 million from the Hong Kong Housing Authority connected with the redevelopment of Hung Hom Estate in Kowloon.
The 22-month contract covers the building of one 31-storey residential block, one 21-storey small household block, and a single-storey podium carpark, it said.
When completed in December 1998, the development will comprise 835 rental domestic units, it said.
